description: I serve as the president of UP MSS (Link to: https://www.facebook.com/upmss/), an organization dedicated to the promotion and advancement of materials science and engineering in the Philippines through various events, outreach programs, and online platforms.

I am the co-founder of this sorority (Link to: https://www.facebook.com/uppikappagamma/), which aims to develop female leaders in the fields of science and engineering while staying true to the original objectives of a sorority: to create leaders and serve the community.

I am one of the Directors of the MSE Summit (Link to: https://www.facebook.com/msesummit/), the countryâ€™s leading avenue for students, professionals, and enthusiasts to take part in celebration of Materials Science and Engineering. This event hosts plenary talks, career talks, a research fair, a maker fair, and an Olympiad.

I directed UP Women in Engineering's Empowerment Series for 2018. This event aimed to encourage female high school students to consider STEM fields by exposing them to powerful rolemodels; established women in STEM.

I oversaw all Education and Research affairs in the UP MSS. This included academic review sessions, weekly Wisdom Wednesday content, academic module creation, academic resource compilation, and alternative classroom learning experiences.
I was responsible for all operations related to the publication of a mini-magazine aimed at freshmen and transferees that contained vital knowledge about the university.
